name: Fragile Flower
description:
In Fragile Flower you play as a dwarf who lost his way in the caves. You need to save this flower and find a way out as soon as possible.

Controls: 
WASD - Move, LMB - Attack, RMB - Interact

ATTENTION

It's pretty hard to figure out how to beat the game all by yourself, so, if you can't figure it out, read the comments.
